CustomField.description: Optional source code for the receipt. This will populate on all invoices related to the receipt. If a source code is already on an invoice the receipt is applied to, the original source code will not be updated with the value of the source code on the receipt.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populates on all invoices related to the receipt. If a source code is already assigned to an invoice the receipt is applied to, the invoice will not be updated with the new source code.
CustomField.label: Source Code
